title: Teacher Qualification Program Utilizing Moodle: Blended Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Blended class design and operational competency enhancement program for in-service teachers using Moodle platform, providing interactive and self-directed learning environments through face-to-face sessions and online learning

learning_goals: Blended learning materials can be designed by utilizing the key features of the Moodle platform
Instructional strategies combining online learning activities (Activity Map) and face-to-face interaction can be applied
Learner engagement and performance can be measured using Moodle-based formative assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
